subject: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Dear,
How are you?
I am Mr. Kinsley Khumalo, a registered loan broker based in South
Africa. I have a ready Investor who is willing to grant you a loan in
capital projects ( i.e Real Estates, Construction, Logistics,
Manufacturing or any viable projects). We have the financial muscle
and capacity to fund projects between US$500,000.00 to US$6.5Billion
for capital projects, and Equity Investment Plans at 3% interest rate
for 10 years tenure with grace period of 12/18 months.
Kindly send your business plan and executive summary or refer us to
anyone with a good business plan, for our investment team review and
immediate funding. We are waiting to proceed with the closing and
disbursement of investment funds and I hope we can work together in
securing these investment funds should you be in need.
Thank you in advance as I anticipate your kind response.
Best Regards.
Kinsley Khumalo

subject: Re:   Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Kinsley Khumalo,

I hope this message finds you well. Your offer sounds quite interesting and I'm curious to learn more about it. Could you please provide me with more details about the investment plans? What kind of projects does your investor usually fund? And could you explain a bit more about the grace period?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Margaret
